评论概述: This jacket is barely insulated and the sleeves are too long.
评论详情: This jacket is advertised as insulated but the insulation is barely there. Not suitable for temperatures below 50 degrees. Many people mentioned this jackets oversize nature, which would be fine except the sleeves are way to long. I'm 6'1" 180 lbs and the medium sleeves are at least 2.5 in too long. I'm not sure just who this is sized for.  The overall construction and materials used seem to be of good quality, nut the lack of actual insulation and the orangutan length sleeves earn this 2 stars.

I like this a lot for running in and outside for work. Its great for oregon weather  Pros: Durability  Easy to clean Comfort: The quilted lining adds warmth without adding bulk, making it comfortable for all-day wear.  Adjustability: Features like adjustable buttons on the waist and cuffs allow for a customized fit.  Style: Its minimalistic design, without overbearing logos, gives it a professional and serious look.  Cons:  Not for Harsh Conditions: While durable, it's not designed for extremely rugged environments.  Sleeve Length: The sleeves can be quite long and large, which might not suit everyone. I just got mine tailored  Overall, the Dickies Eisenhower Jacket is a great choice for those looking for a well-made, versatile jacket that can be worn in various settings. Whether you're heading to work or just out and about, this jacket offers a blend of style, comfort, and durability.

评论概述: Just a good basic work jacket.
评论详情: I have had a few of these over the years.  Nothing fancy.  Not heavily insulated.  Just enough to take the chill off.  I will advise, go ahead and wash this when you get it.  Right when you take it out of the package.  I believe they starched them right before packaging, and it will be like wearing a thin piece of cardboard if you don't wash it.  Trust me.  I wore this thing for a week, and it did NOT soften up.No complaints, just a good basic jacket for anyone who works at a company that doesn't allow for 'street type' jackets and such.
It's incredibly comfortable, surprisingly warm, and looks really nice as a work or going out jacket.
I ordered this as a gift for my father for christmas. It keeps you warm and looks stylish. Highly reccomended!

first off, very stylish, especially in black, classic look. wash it once and it's pretty much broken in. the insulation is pretty warm, not a winter jacket unless you layer under it, but late fall and early spring it's pretty perfect, the shell does a decent job at repelling water too, inner pocket is very nice too
Warm and perfect for my work also looks great

Simple Review:  Im 5’6 157 Lbs. With An Athletic Build. My Normal True To Size In Tops Is A Medium.  I Went With A Medium On This Jacket And It Fits PERFECT. With Just Enough Room To Wear A Hoodie Under If Needed. The Sleeves Fall About 1 Inch Past My Wrist When My Arms Are To My Side.  Jacket Is Lightweight But Very Durable And Tough. This Can Definitely Be A Winter/ Fall And Spring Type Jacket.  If Your Looking And Thinking About It, Id Definitely Recommend. Will Be Back For More Colors.

The Dickies Eisenhower jacket is a timeless piece known for its durability, comfort, and versatile style. Perfect for everyday wear, it combines functionality with a sleek design that suits both casual and work settings. What truly stands out is the quick delivery to Lima, Peru—arriving faster than expected, making it a reliable choice for those who need quality outerwear in a hurry. Whether you’re looking for a jacket that can withstand tough conditions or simply want a classic look, the Eisenhower is a solid investment with speedy shipping!

评论概述: Mechanic boyfriend loved his Xmas present
评论详情: Fits great for average xl man, proportions are what are expected for this style of jacket - shorter/waist length, slightly boxy/in shoulders upper arms - preferred by the recipient- my boyfriend and mechanic - who likes his clothes to be fitted BUT comfortable first and most importantly - he layers underneath (long sleeve shirt/potential flannel/& finally a hoodie sweatshirt underneath on those really cold days - and he stays warm in NJ winter weather working in a garage. It was intended for work so I’m not sure if the fit would be as ideal if you didn’t intend to layer as extensively as he does daily… but works for him and what we bought it for. It’s polished/professional looking without being *too* explicitly uniform esque.. actually finishes his top layer with a bit more style that he was lacking with his old coat or any of the other aforementioned layers he wears underneath.. he asked for this specifically and after researching/considering Carhartt options that were more than 2x the price, I’m happy I listened & went with this lol. Would buy again! DEF get the lined version, I can’t imagine the unlined being any more than a denim jacket, possibly even offering less in the warmth dept on that topic. Esthetically it probably is nice for warm climates but it’s totally worth the price to get the lined version of this jacket.

Classic design and built to last. The fit is on point. Amazon recommended a small, but I went with a medium. I think a small one would have been too snug. I was initially worried that the sleeves would be too long/big, but the length and size are just right. The sleeves rest slightly below my wrist but do not cover my whole hand. For reference, I am about 6'0 and weigh about 160-165, average build.
The jacket was too big and I went true to size. What a joke. I ordered a l and it was way too long on arms and but nice at waist.
The right color and fit , very pleased! Thank you

评论概述: jacket has certainly changed since my last one in 2004
评论详情: this jacket runs a bit large.  i have a small in the non-lined as well as lined from 15 years ago and the new jacket is a bout half size larger.  could be the other two shrank with time as they are of a very different material.  the new material is very 'rubbery' and more rigid even after a wash and dry.  will see how long the quilting inside retains its integrity.addition of interior pocket a nice touch.  interesting in that dickies now has slightly contrasting stitching around the collar.  runs a bit large.  typical jackets i would be between a small and a medium.  this jacket fits like a medium so has room to add an additional hoodie or other thick jacket underneath to fill the gap inside.again, the materil feels strange but also more rugged, synthetic feel than the earlier generations.the smell of chemicals is strong when opened.  seems to the the smell of the poly filling on the interior.have 'airing out' for a coupld days  in the other room.fit is good and im sure it will last another 10 years.
Awesome
